name: Exceptional Aid
text: You’re always ready to lend your partner a hand.
benefit: When you successfully use the Aid Another action to assist an ally’s skill check, and the ally also has this feat, the bonus is +4 instead of +2.
text_zh: 你总是准备好给予你伙伴帮助。
benefit_zh: 当你成功使用援助他人动作来为一名盟友的技能检定提供帮助时，且该盟友也同样拥有该专长的话，该加值可为+4而非+2。
